Content:
Ok ... one relatively easy puzzle from me ))

**Wen Moon Puzzle**

Wen Moon was a chinese McDonald's manager. But in 2045, when 1 DEX = 500 BTC he remember about it and start trying to recover his funds ... The only one thing that he remember about "sent day" was that this is end of week and he was very drunk ))
